name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Analytics Engineer with 9+ years of experience in SQL, data modeling, data transformation, and building data pipelines. Proficient in utilizing **Azure Data Factory**, **Snowflake**, **BigQuery**, and **Looker** to create powerful reporting and dashboard solutions. Skilled in implementing KPI frameworks and workflow automation with tools like **dbt**, **Airflow**, **Talend**, and **n8n**. Proven track record of delivering insightful analytics and optimizing data workflows. Adept at leveraging **Python** and **R** for advanced data analysis. Strong collaboration skills with a history of leading cross-functional projects to successful completion. Well-versed in utilizing cloud hosting and SaaS solutions to enhance data processes.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed data pipelines using **Azure Data Factory** and **Airflow**, enabling efficient data transformation and integration, leading to a 30% increase in data processing speed.
• Created and optimized SQL queries and **dbt** models for robust data modeling and analytics, enhancing data accuracy by 20%.
• Designed interactive dashboards and reports using **Looker** and **Power BI**, providing stakeholders with real-time insights and improving decision-making processes.
• Implemented workflow automation with **Talend** and **n8n** to streamline data extraction and transformation, reducing manual effort by 50%.
• Utilized **Snowflake** and **BigQuery** for cloud-based data warehousing, managing datasets exceeding 1 TB with efficient storage solutions.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish KPI frameworks, ensuring alignment with business objectives and enhancing performance tracking.
• Developed and maintained robust reporting engines to visualize key metrics and support strategic initiatives.
• Leveraged **Python** and **R** for data analysis and transformation, resulting in impactful insights for product development.
• Communicated effectively in **German** with team members and stakeholders, facilitating smooth collaboration in a multilingual environment.
• Drove improvements in cloud hosting strategies and SaaS integrations, enhancing system capabilities and user experiences.

Developed and optimized **SQL** queries for **PostgreSQL** and **MSSQL** databases, enhancing data retrieval processes and improving performance by **20%**.
Designed and implemented **data pipelines** using **Airflow** for automated workflows ensuring timely data updates and transformations.
Built interactive reporting tools and dashboards using **Looker** and **Power BI**, increasing analytical insights for stakeholders by **30%**.
Created and maintained **data models** to support effective **data transformation** and enhanced decision-making, contributing to a **15%** improvement in KPI tracking.
Leveraged **Azure Data Factory** and **dbt** for orchestrating ETL processes, ensuring efficient movement of data to **Snowflake** and **BigQuery**.
Developed and implemented **workflow automation** strategies using **Talend** and **n8n**, resulting in a **25%** reduction in manual tasks and increased operational efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define analytics requirements and business KPIs, ensuring alignment with project goals and successful delivery.
Mentored junior analysts on best practices in **data modeling** and reporting, leading to a more skilled and productive team environment.
Conducted thorough code reviews and facilitated training sessions to improve the overall quality of analytics deliverables.
Utilized **Python** and **R** for advanced data analysis, providing actionable insights that supported strategic initiatives.

• Designed and implemented data pipelines and workflows using **Azure Data Factory** and **Airflow**, enhancing data processing efficiency by **30%**.
• Developed and maintained reports and dashboards in **Looker** and **Power BI**, providing actionable insights that improved decision-making processes for stakeholders by **25%**.
• Leveraged **SQL** and **Snowflake** for data modeling and transformation, resulting in an increase in data retrieval speed by **15%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish KPI frameworks for measuring business performance, driving projects aligned with strategic objectives.
• Automated data workflows using **Talend** and **n8n**, reducing manual intervention and improving process reliability.
• Supported cloud hosting and SaaS solutions to ensure scalability and accessibility for analytics processes.
• Utilized **Python** and **R** for data analysis and transformation, enriching datasets and enhancing analytical capabilities.
• Delivered comprehensive technical documentation and user guides for analytics tools and processes, facilitating knowledge transfer across teams.
• Actively participated in daily standups and code reviews to align project milestones and maintain coding standards.
